title: Anti-malarial shows promise in human clinical study

title_detail.value: Anti-malarial shows promise in human clinical study

summary: An experimental drug, called DSM265, cured seven volunteers of a Plasmodium falciparum infection, a malaria parasite that is a major cause of morbidity and mortality worldwide. The goal of this research is to find a cure for malaria with a single dose, and ultimately, eradicate the parasite.
